story_99_00403/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh my, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The Egg looks ready to hatch, you say?
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0200_10:
Goodness, you’re right! What perfecto timing.
It looks like the Pokémon might burst through the
shell any second now!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0300_10:
Quelle surprise! What a cute little 
[Name:TutorialEggPokemonName ]!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hehe, it seems rather attached to you already.
Do take good care of it!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0500_10:
Have a small token of my thanks for your
contribution to my research!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0600_10:
Giving goodies to Pokémon that you’ve hatched
from Eggs will make them feel friendlier
toward you!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0700_10:
How delightful it will be to see what kind of
sync pair you and [Name:TutorialEggPokemonName ]
grow into!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0800_10:
Oh my, is that the time? I need to do some
shopping and hurry back to the lab!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_0900_10:
By the way, the shop here has all sorts of
handy items in stock. Why don’t you go and
have a look?
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1000_10:
I suppose I’ll leave you to it for now!
I’d better be off. Do svidaniya!
Good luck!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1100_10:
Welcome, welcome! Today is our grand opening,
so feel free to stop by and browse through our
stock anytime!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1200_10:
You can make changes to your team right
over here. Why don’t you try doing it now?
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1300_10: Perfect! You successfully edited your team.
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1400_10:
Feel free to use team editing to your advantage
whenever you meet new sync pairs!
story_99_00403/2401_1001_1500_10:
Thank you for stopping by.
I look forward to your next visit!
